message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $19,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000? This price reflects the true value of the product.

I'm still not convinced that $17,000 is the right price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $15,500. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
